text: This may not work with mods designed for the game OA is inspired from.

Make sure to have at least 6 of each of team_CTF_redspawn, team_CTF_redplayer, team_CTF_bluespawn and team_CTF_blueplayer.
If this is completely omitted then deathmatch spawn point will be used
This item is broken in some older versions of OA and the game it’s inspired from. May not work.
